amendment.description: To prohibit an eligible entity offering a Medicare Prescription Drug plan, a MedicareAdvantage Organization offering a MedicareAdvantage plan, and other health plans from contracting with a pharmacy benefit manager (PBM) unless the PBM satisfies certain requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 942 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 942 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S8291; text: CR S8291) To prohibit an eligible entity offering a Medicare Prescription Drug plan, a MedicareAdvantage Organization offering a MedicareAdvantage plan, and other health plans from contracting with a pharmacy benefit manager (PBM) unless the PBM satisfies certain requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 942 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Cantwell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 942 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
